column4: in case anyone is interested, a bootable usb can be created from an iso image using the USB Startup Disk Creator under system administration. how easy is that!
as well as with this -> for various distros :D http://unetbootin.sourceforge.net/
it says on the link 'try the windows version, it usually works better'...that can't be agood thing!!? ;-)
tried  it to make a usb stick today and works perfectly
